repo.description: The most widely used Python to C compiler
repo.name: cython

body:
Errors module is initialized during running pipeline:

https://github.com/cython/cython/blob/b462eec9899988a8d9c6637669ad8fcf1e3988ab/Cython/Compiler/Main.py#L521

There is a warning informing about deprecated name of .pxd file during the search of .pxd file:

https://github.com/cython/cython/blob/b462eec9899988a8d9c6637669ad8fcf1e3988ab/Cython/Compiler/Main.py#L694

However, the search can be run before running pipeline:
```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/Users/matus/dev/cython/test/setup.py", line 6, in <module>
    ext_modules=cythonize("module.pyx", include_path=['bar']),
  File "/Users/matus/dev/cython/Cython/Build/Dependencies.py", line 990, in cythonize
    module_list, module_metadata = create_extension_list(
  File "/Users/matus/dev/cython/Cython/Build/Dependencies.py", line 839, in create_extension_list
    kwds = deps.distutils_info(file, aliases, base).values
  File "/Users/matus/dev/cython/Cython/Build/Dependencies.py", line 691, in distutils_info
    return (self.transitive_merge(filename, self.distutils_info0, DistutilsInfo.merge)
  File "/Users/matus/dev/cython/Cython/Build/Dependencies.py", line 700, in transitive_merge
    return self.transitive_merge_helper(
  File "/Users/matus/dev/cython/Cython/Build/Dependencies.py", line 712, in transitive_merge_helper
    for next in outgoing(node):
  File "/Users/matus/dev/cython/Cython/Utils.py", line 129, in wrapper
    res = cache[args] = f(self, *args)
  File "/Users/matus/dev/cython/Cython/Build/Dependencies.py", line 613, in cimported_files
    pxd_file = self.find_pxd(module, filename)
  File "/Users/matus/dev/cython/Cython/Utils.py", line 129, in wrapper
    res = cache[args] = f(self, *args)
  File "/Users/matus/dev/cython/Cython/Build/Dependencies.py", line 594, in find_pxd
    pxd = self.context.find_pxd_file(relative, source_file_path=filename)
  File "/Users/matus/dev/cython/Cython/Compiler/Main.py", line 270, in find_pxd_file
```

I have investigated the possibility to move `Errors` module initialisation to earlier stage but I found it rather disruptive change. Hence, I am proposing
to move the check of .pxd file name to the code called elusively within the pipeline run.

Fixes #5396

comment_data.body: I'm actually not sure that this file is copied into the test directory. I think it can be deleted.
When file is deleted the test is failing.

We already have a couple of `dotted*` tests in `build/` and `compile/`. I don't think they really test fundamentally different aspects of this feature. But it's deprecated anyway and we can possibly remove it as soon as Cython 3.1, so I don't mind adding to it.

commit.message: Avoid calling warning() before Errors initialized

commit.message: Fix case when pxd filename contains cython version
Merge branch 'dotted_pxd' of https://github.com/matusvalo/cython into dotted_pxd

repo.description: The most widely used Python to C compiler
repo.name: cython

milestone.description:
Goals:
– New version scheme: 3.x instead of 0.x.
– Change default `language_level` from `2` to `3str`.
– Change default for `binding` directive from `False` to `True`.
– Fix some Python compatibility issues (if possible, allowing for breaking changes).

title: Avoid calling warning() before `Errors` module initialised
